name: Engineering Portfolio V3.0
headline: Engineering Portfolio overhaul with a focus on using Django instead of WordPress
description: This is the third version of my personal engineering portfolio. Version 2.0 was created with WordPress. While it's a great Content Management System(CMS), it was not the ideal solution. I learned Django to create a CMS that served my needs for a single page website. Furthermore, I learned Less to simplify writing CSS.
